title: Mini Van Large (mini vanguard Large)
synopsis: The stage is set on a moon of Planet Cray, "Aniversario." To develop the moon, Selca summons Aichi, Chrono and friends. A large undertaking by familiar vanguard characters!
staff: [['Nishiyama, Tsukasa', ['Director']], ['Takadera, Takeshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Nakajima, Naotoshi', ['Script', ' Series Composition']], ['Quily', ['Original Creator']]]
